text:
I am currently a PhD student in Political Science at the University of Texas at Dallas. My research interests include civil resistance, democratic backsliding, election and voting behavior, and East Asian politics.













Civil resistance
Democratic backsliding
Electoral studies
East Asian politics






PhD in Political Science, Current University of Texas at Dallas
MS in Social Data Analytics and Research, Current University of Texas at Dallas
MA in International Politics and East Asia, 2013 University of Warwick
BSSc in in Government and Public Administration, 2012 Chinese University of Hong Kong

Wong, Stan Hok-Wui, and Kelvin Chun-Man Chan. “Determinants of Political Purges in Autocracies: Evidence from Ancient Chinese Dynasties.” Journal of Peace Research 58, no. 3 (May 2021): 583–98.





Choy, Ivan Chi-keung, Ngok Ma, & Kelvin Chun-Man Chan. (2021). The Electoral System and Voting Behaviour in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region [特區選舉: 制度與投票行為]. Hong Kong: City University of Hong Kong Press.
